/*
 * CC40-TilesCME04.cpp
 *
 *  Created on: 17-Apr-2012
 *      Author: Rishi
 */

#include <iostream>
int main () {
	int testcases;
	std::cin>>testcases;
	unsigned long l_room, b_room, l_tile, b_tile;
	while (testcases--) {
		std::cin>>l_room>>b_room>>l_tile>>b_tile;

		if (((l_room % l_tile) == 0 && (b_room % b_tile) == 0) ||
				((l_room % b_tile) == 0 && (b_room % l_tile) ==0))

			std::cout<<"yes"<<std::endl;
		else
			std::cout<<"no"<<std::endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
